work.name: Robin Cook
highlights: Performing the entire process of cleaning, preprocessing, and analyzing large datasets using Python and SQL.
Conducting exploratory data analysis on diverse performance metrics, customer behavior data, leading to the identification of key patterns and insights that informed marketing strategy adjustments.
Creating interactive data visualization using PowerBI to communicate complex findings to non-technical audiences, enhancing data-driven decision-making processes..
Conducting statistical hypothesis testing on A/B marketing experiments.
Developed a Flask-based API that generates dynamic maps visualizing delivery areas and error-prone regions for customer success team
Automated Python script using Google Ads API to extract restaurant search results, identifying potential customers through keyword combinations
Automated routine data entry tasks, reducing manual workload by 20%.

work.name: Mechanics and Renewable Energies Lab
highlights: Conducted various experiments for desalination and solar vapor generation.
Compared different mass concentrations of ZnO nanofluids and investigated the effect of using wood coated with ZnO on the evaporation rate.
Increased the evaporation efficiency by 38% for ZnO-wood and by 22% for ZnO nanofluid (0.004%wt.) compared to water.

work.name: Ferdowsi University of Mashhad
highlights: Assisted in teaching various numerical analysis concepts
Utilized MATLAB to demonstrate different numerical methods
Assessed and graded theoretical and programming assignments
